info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:51PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN EDDY AND WEST CENTRAL LEA COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 651 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of Avalon, or 23 miles northeast of Carlsbad, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Maljamar, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
